content: MQZ-F Bored plate (stainless steel) Stainless steel (A4) bored plate for trapeze assembly and anchoring (imperial) ### Categories: Home > Products > Modular support systems > Standard fixings for support systems- - - ### FEATURES:Features Suitable for MQ strut channels and brackets Easy to install Applications Fastening threaded parts to MQ strut channels Wing nut or spring nut applications with channels or brackets Anchor fastening of installation channels Recommended for use in corrosive environments ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material composition: Stainless steel, 1.4404 (A4) – EN 10088, AISI 316L Surface finish: Outdoor Plus - Stainless Steel Environmental conditions: Outdoor high pollution (C4 – high / C5) Technical Data | Material composition | Stainless steel, 1.4404 (A4) – EN 10088, AISI 316L | Surface finish | Outdoor Plus - Stainless Steel | Environmental conditions | Outdoor high pollution (C4 – high / C5) ### ITEMS- 304076 - Base plate MQZ-F 3/8-R SS316 - Package Size 20 pc
